items.sentence: Tom and Mary are both pretty old, aren't they?
Tom and Mary are both overweight, aren't they?
Tom and Mary are both doing that, aren't they?
Tom and Mary are both carpenters, aren't they?
Tom and John fell in love with the same woman.
Tom and John are both dating women named Mary.
I'm not willing to do what Tom asked me to do.
I wonder why Tom thinks Mary wants to do that.
I was warned not to believe anything Tom says.
I don't know whether I can believe Tom or not.
